title: Update hero copy for course modes across Chhattisgarh and redesign the upper (header/hero) area

requirements.text: Update the website’s top/hero messaging to clearly state that courses are available in Open/Distance mode and Online mode, and that these options are available across Chhattisgarh, using correct English spelling and grammar.

quotes: COUSRE OPEN AND DISTENCE, AND ONLINE ALSO AVAILAVBLE .ACROSS CHHATTISGARH. CHANGE UPPER DEIGINE

acceptanceCriteria: Home hero section includes the information that courses are available in Open/Distance and Online modes.
Home hero section includes the information that services/courses are available across Chhattisgarh.
All new/updated user-facing text is in clear English with correct spelling (e.g., “Open/Distance”, “Online”, “Chhattisgarh”).

requirements.text: Revise the upper section design (header + home hero area) to a refreshed, more polished layout while keeping the existing navigation targets (Home/Services/Streams/About/Contact), responsiveness, and scroll-to-section behavior intact.
acceptanceCriteria: Header remains fixed and functional on desktop and mobile, including the mobile menu toggle and smooth scrolling to sections.
The hero section layout/styling is visibly updated (typography, spacing, and/or composition) without removing the existing CTAs.
The updated upper design remains consistent with the site’s existing design system (colors, typography, components) and does not introduce blue/purple as the primary palette.
No changes are made to immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (hooks and ui components remain unedited).

constraints: Respect the existing single-actor backend architecture; no backend changes are required for this request.
Do not edit files under frontend immutablePaths (compose existing UI components instead).
Use English for any user-facing text added/modified.
nonGoals: Adding new site sections beyond adjusting the existing header/hero area.
Changing the contact form backend submission flow or inquiry storage.
Adding third-party integrations or authentication changes.
